name: Recreational Dreaming
description: Recreational Dreaming is a casual stroll through a softer, shinier mind. Explore, shoot, and chill.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6402P CPU @ 2.80 GHz, 2808 Mhz, 4 Cores Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Should run fine on any "VR Ready" machine
